lines.text: I don't sing with my ass!
She went to shit and the hogs ate her!
[last lines]

[final lines]
You really love David, don't you?
Yep, I do.
Yeah, I like him too, I just hate his taste in music. He always said you could fight with somebody and still like him.
Hey, now you're using your old noggin! Thanks pal!
[hugs and kisses]
My boy!
Mom, mom, I can't breathe!
Mott the Hoople AGAIN?

[Tommy's milking a cow]
Hey, Tommy, watch the fingernails.
Well, Christ, she's got tits the size of cucumbers. What do you expect?
Ahem. I don't know where he gets that language, I really don't.
Think real hard, it'll come to you, lady.
I could lay under you, eat fried chicken and do a crossword puzzle at the same time; that's how much you bother me.
Put in another quarter and try again...
Tucson's the weird capital of the world... WEIRD.
So who's stoppin' ya?... Pack yer bags; I'll take you to Monterey... I don't give a damn about that ranch.

[to Alice, disparaging David's style of music]
Shit-kicking! shit-kicking! shit-kicking!

[while driving Tommy home from the police station]
Ya look like you've been embalmed.

[after Tommy, was being a smart aleck]
If you open your mouth, once more, I swear to God, I'm gonna nail it shut.
[Opens his mouth]
I'm warning you, Tommy. I'm gonna throw you out, and you're gonna walk the last mile home.
[Tommy makes, faces at his mother]
Get out!
[Kicks Tommy, out of the car, and Alice drives away]
Life is short.
Yeah, well, so are you.

[as Audrey is leaving the police station]
So long, suckers!
He asked us out there Sunday.
Farmer John's just gonna have to get along without me, I can tell you that.
I want to go.
No.

[Jumping on the couch]
Yes!
No!
YES!
NO!

[Kicks the couch]
Shit!
I AM a singer.
Shoot the dog. Shoot the dog. Shoot the dog.
Mom, are we in Arizona yet?
If you ask me that one more time, I'm gonna beat you to death. Just sit back there and relax and enjoy life, huh?
Life is short.
So are you.

[Brandishing a switchblade, at Rita]
If you don't drag your ass, out that door or, I'll cut you. I'll cut your ass
[Kicks Rita, on the backside]
, GET OUT!
